articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: New alien-looking millipede species with 200 legs discovered in African jungle - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The newfound millipedes each measure a few centimeters in length and boasting around 200 legs.
articles.content: Scientists have recently unveiled a new genus and five previously unknown millipede species hidden within the dense jungles of Tanzania's Udzungwa Mountains. The revelation came to light during a stu… [+1471 chars]
